channel.title: Resonant Echo
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Resonant Echo" - Why isn't this Dunamancy spell listed?

item.title: Re: Resonant Echo
item.content:encoded: To my understanding, the spell was never officially released. If you've found it, then either you're a better online detective than I am or you found someone's homebrew version of the finished spell. If you'd like to share your source and it's indeed legitimate/official, then I'd be happy to add the spell to this wiki, but I'd still need to see it (if only to see what a completed version of the spell would look like).

item.title: Re: Resonant Echo
item.content:encoded: I just recently found a copy of the spell. works just fine.

item.title: Re: Resonant Echo
item.content:encoded:
Resonant Echo was a work-in-progress spell when it appeared in CR campaign 2, but by the time they had finished making Explorer's Guide to Wildemount, they decided to cut it in favor of developing the Echo Knight's "Manifest Echo" ability. The WIP that Matt gave Liam and that was used a few times in the campaign was never made publicly available, and it's likely that it never will be.

TLDR: the spell doesn't exist anymore

item.title: Resonant Echo
item.content:encoded: and its not just on this site, its everything where the CR team's content is displayed, even 5Etools doesn't have that spell shown for some odd ball reason either.
